entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Prince Albert
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:21 PM CST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -28.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince Albert Airport 12:00 AM CST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -28.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -31.8°C
Wind: WSW 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 31.
